analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/11/0xbcd4012cecbbfc7a73ec4a14ebb39406d361a0f5.sol:
	Contract DreamToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/11/0xbcd4012cecbbfc7a73ec4a14ebb39406d361a0f5.sol#191-192)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/11/0xbcd4012cecbbfc7a73ec4a14ebb39406d361a0f5.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (/unique_chucks/11/0xbcd4012cecbbfc7a73ec4a14ebb39406d361a0f5.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/11/0xbcd4012cecbbfc7a73ec4a14ebb39406d361a0f5.sol#62-65) is not in mixedCase
